mapper.select: select roots.target_id as id, ifnull(g.name, s.name) as name, target as "objectType", 1 as child_count, ifnull(S.is_deleted, '0') as is_deleted from (select target_id, target from user_privilege_view ROOT where ROOT.user_id = #{0.id} and target in ('S','O') ) roots left join site s on s.id = roots.target_id left join user_group g on g.id = roots.target_id where roots.target_id not in ( select child_id from tree_xref X, user_privilege_view P where P.user_id = #{0.id} and P.target_id = X.parent_id and X.tree_type = 'P' and X.child_object_type in ('S','O') and X.distance > 0)

SELECT ifnull(G.id,S.id) AS ID, X.child_object_type AS "objectType", X.child_count AS CHILD_COUNT, ifnull(G.name,S.name) AS NAME, ifnull(S.parent_id,ifnull(G.parent_id,G.site_id)) AS PARENT_ID, ifnull(S.is_deleted, '0') as is_deleted FROM TREE_XREF X left join site s on s.id = x.child_id left join user_group g on g.id = x.child_id WHERE X.parent_id=#{0.id} and X.tree_type='P' and X.child_object_type in ('S','O') and X.distance=1
